title: #362: The Missing 411 With Our Big Dumb Mouth's Midnight Mike
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome back Our Big Dumb Mouth's Midnight Mike to discuss David Paulides' research into the bizarro cases of missing people that have been occurring over decades in our national parks. Who or what is snatching up these people? Could it be Big Foot, Nazi or Aliens or even Chewbacca? The TFH crew has it's theories! Thank you so much for your support.

See Sam Tripoli Live:
Appleton Wisconsin Sept 10th-12th: Headlining the Skyline Comedy Club:
www.skylinecomedy.com/events/40525

Raleigh North Carolina: Sept 24-26 Goodnight Comedy Club:
www.goodnightscomedy.com/

St. Louis, Missouri: Oct 1st-3rd: Headlining the St. Louis Helium Comedy Club:
st-louis.heliumcomedy.com
